short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch with me is an extension enable multiple users to watch and host watch parties on multiple entartainment platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Host up to a million-guests watch parties. Lead your audience from your camera as they can interact with you through chat while you all watch the same show, synced for everyone. Our watch parties are automatically recorded, can be replayed, and even asynchronously live-commented by everyone after the live. This means that a chat comment added in replay mode will be synced into the show runtime and the live chat timeline. As a result, your non-live chat comments will be added to the live chat timeline forever.
